comment: Can't really say much besides this course is an easy A. I have learned almost nothing from taking this course but at least it's a GPA booster. Weekly discussion posts, four reading assessments about a seemingly unrelated book and two tests. Take him if you're satisfying the last of your LDRS credits, you have nothing to lose.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor Ford is very easy going and is great at making students feel comfortable. Very friendly, and provides interesting material for good class discussions. Most students won't take KSU1101 seriously, but personally I think it was a really good class.
Professor Ford is very friendly and inspirational. He made a boring class more interesting, although there is a larger workload for just a seminar class.
Professor Ford made a boring class less boring. He was always there for help on any assignments, gave good feedback and graded easily.

I disagree with the negative comment as well. He was a WONDERFUL professor and overall made this class enjoyable. Lots of assignments but never any boring lectures which is good. Grades very leniently and is very generous with extra credit. I would take him again in a heartbeat! Also loved the bond he made with my class during the semester. A++++

Professor Ford was phenomenal. Very funny guy. He kept the class interesting even through the boring PowerPoint lectures. He gives a lot of work, but trust me its all worth it in the end. He's very specific but very helpful and always there for you if you need help. He's not boring at all and makes class super fun.

Amazing professor-highly recommend. Does't give a ton of lectures and likes students to be involved. Gives several assignments but knows you can complete them. If you listen to what he says, then you will understand he wants his students to exceed at the highest level possible. Wakes you up from the high school easiness but it's worth it in the end

Seriously the best class I took all semester- I'll actually miss it because of Professor Ford's kindness & genuineness.  He is honestly always there for you- whether it's school-related or not.  I emailed him earlier in the semester wsome stress related problems & he was so helpful & kind.  An amazing man & professor, I would definitely take him!
